  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    run()
    Runs the thread of Enemy Invade, to decide how much to stay in a bubble, when to follow player, how much time before disappearing after death and how often to randomly jump.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemyInvader

      public EnemyInvader(int x, int y)
      Creates a new enemy invader, it can jump higer,longer, follows player longer. Gives VALUE points when killed.
      Parameters:
      x - width position
      y - height position

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the thread of Enemy Invade, to decide how much to stay in a bubble, when to follow player, how much time before disappearing after death and how often to randomly jump. A random number 0/100 is given to randomize some actions.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Enemy
